title: Atomic energy explained
creator_credit: Film Producers Guild and British Information Services
brief_description: A practical outline of atomic energy and its peaceful applications. Studies the structure of atomic particles and shows how energy can be released from them to produce atomic power. Also illustrates how radio-isotopes are being put to valuable use in modern industry and medicine. No other credits available.
